title: Over half of Instagram’s biggest fans unhappy with Facebook’s new ad frequency
text: ANALYSIS: There is no doubt that Instagram is a phenomenon. The social network has grown from nothing in 2010 to a user base that now boasts 400 million people worldwide, 77 million of whom are in the U.S. 80 million photos are shared daily on the image-centric social network, providing constant joy to those of us who […] »
